external_games.name: Tiger Tank 59 Ⅰ Winter Assault MP074

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: Winter Assault MP074
summary: "Tiger Tank 59 Ⅰ Winter Assault" is a top-down shooting game. In this game players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks. The DLC include map pack 074.
